attributes.action: Prevent any further lockdown measures from being put in place.
attributes.additional_details: Let those who are fit and healthy and can afford the risk of contracting the virus, work and run their businesses and support the country financially. So that the country can then afford to support those who are at risk and need to shield.
attributes.background:
The government have tried lockdown, circuit breakers etc. 
All this has achieved so far is to put the country in to the biggest debt we have ever been in. It is not resolving the covid issue and will not resolve it. Debt and poverty also lead to death.
